#summary Root documentation page for pmtk3

= Installation =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/pmtk3/downloads/list Download] the latest pmtk3 zip file and unzip it say to "C:\pmtk3" or "~/pmtk3". 

  * If running MATLAB, install [http://code.google.com/p/graphviz4matlab/ graphViz4Matlab] used by some of the demos.
 
  * Start Matlab/Octave. Then type
{{{
cd C:\pmtk3
initPmtk3
}}}
  * To test the system, type
{{{
testPmtk3
}}}
(If you have more patience, you can try 'runDemos')
